name: Big Hair Games
body:
# Planet VS Planet
## About

Planet vs Planet (or, PvP for short) is a local multiplayer physics-based-planetary-arena-deathmatch (PBPAD) where players are tethered to one another with a giant, indestructible space rope.

Fling your opponent into planets, asteroids and other hazards celestial bodies and avoid annihalating yourself in the process. Collect cool powerups to help you survive the arena.

## How To Play
Player 1: WASD

Player 2: Arrow Keys

You can also plug in your favorite generic gamepad
Guide your rocket powered world to glory by steering it into powerups and avoiding planets

## Credits
Created for [LUDUM DARE 30](ludumdare.com/compo) jam by:

* [Ben Joubert](twitter.com/benjamenjoubert) - Code

* [Daniel Mendelowitz](twitter.com/danmendelowitz) - Art

## Tools Used:
* Unity
* Blender
* Audacity
* GIMP
* Paint.NET
